entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
